item.description:
A couple of times a year, the Shops in downtown New Haven hold "Flights of Fancy".  Join NHCer Alina for the next Installment this Friday!

You start by Registering at "The Study" hotel.  Registration is $10 and they will provide you an Event Wine Glass and a Map of all the participating Shops. (And validated parking.)

From there you wander around downtown New Haven to each participating shop on the map and get a Wine Sample at each!  (The Wine Thief provides the Wines)  If you chose to shop, each participating store provides a discount of 25% off for the event.  Shops are said to be in the Broadway and Chapel street districts.

Afterward attendees can return to The Study at 8:30 p.m. for included Willoughby’s coffee, Dessert, and a grand prize drawing for a complimentary stay for two at The Study Hotel at Yale.

Update: The websites are a bit unclear about registration. One of them says reservations are "Recommended" the other says Required.  At the time I'm typing this, you can still pre-register online by following the link That says "Register Here" at the bottom, then again on the page it brings you to.  Or you can see if my attempts to hyper link it work.  They do not ask for the money at the online registration, so no worries there if you're unsure.

Alina will Host this event and can be reached at 608-432-5462 if you have trouble finding the Group.  Thanks Alina! The Plan is to meet at the Bar area of the Study at 4:00 to start out.  Give us a call if you need to catch up after that.  (It is an early start for a work day for some.)

If you would like more information about the Event, you can visit the website HERE (Hyperlinked). (Included is a list of participating shops.)

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will Start in the Bar Area at the Study (go right after the entrance.). Call your Host listed in the Details after that.
